products.name: PCOS Balance
products.long_description: A complete Ayurvedic solution for women's health, this malt helps regulate menstrual cycles, ease period pain, and manage symptoms of PCOD. Made with a blend of traditional herbs, it's a natural way to restore balance.

products.name: PCOS Balance
products.long_description: Specially formulated to support hormonal balance in women with PCOS. This blend helps manage weight, improve skin health, and regulate periods. A natural approach to wellness.
